lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert. Our deepest condolences go to our cherished family friend for over 35 years. Bob was a true gentleman in every sense of the word and was loved, cherished and respected by us all. Our broken hearts go out to Betsy, Ned, Nancy and their families on this tragic loss. May he rest in peace. Heidi and Richard Horowitz Jill and Jeff Libshutz
